name.description: sets the name of the device must be called at run time

gamepad.description: enables controller to have a gamepad. takes in intager input for the amount of buttons between 2-4

dpad.description: enables controller to have a dpad

rightstick.description: enables a right joystick on the controller. is dependant on the left stick

leftstick.description: enables a left joystick on the controller.

menu.description: enables the start and select buttons on the controller
